6 - The Lord Loveth a Cheerful Giver

Periodical: The Southern Watchman
April 16, 1907
     “The Lord now calls upon the members of the Seventh-day Adventist Church in every locality to consecrate themselves to Him, and to do their very best, according to their circumstances, to assist in His work. By their liberality in making gifts and offerings, He desires them to reveal their appreciation of His blessings, and their gratitude for His mercy.
